https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-gl-style-spec
[Changes](https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-gl-style-spec/compare/v19.3.0...v19.3.1) since [MapLibre Style Spec v19.3.0](https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-gl-style-spec/releases/tag/v19.3.0):

* Document `raster-fade-duration` property's effect on rendering a video. [#297](https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-style-spec/pull/297)
* Add and expose `isZoomExpression`. [#267](https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-style-spec/issues/267)
